trans-unit.source: Represents a field that is displayed as a button in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et felt som vises som en knapp i en databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The ButtonField class is used by data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) to display a button for each record that is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ButtonField brukes av databundet kontroller (eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) til å vise en knapp for hver oppføring som vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonField object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: Objektet ButtonField vises forskjellig avhengig databundet kontrollen den brukes.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a ButtonField object as a column, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays it as a row.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen viser en ButtonField-objektet som en kolonne, mens den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen viser som en rad.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Clicking a button in a button field raises the command event of the parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer knappen i et felt for hendelsen kommandoen for den overordnede databundet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can provide a custom routine to perform when a command button is clicked by providing an event handler for the command event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en egendefinert rutine til å utføre når en kommandoknappen ved å angi en hendelsesbehandling for kommandoen-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollerer hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>hendelse, mens den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the record that raises the command event, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the event argument that is passed to the command event for the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå indeksen for posten som viser kommandoen hendelsen i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>for hendelsen argumentet som sendes til kommandoen-hendelsen for kontrollen som er bundet til data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonField class automatically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property with the appropriate index value.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ButtonField automatisk fyller ut den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>egenskapen med den riktige indeksverdien.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the type of button to display, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi hvilken type for å vise, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When displaying a link or command button, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A> property to specify the caption to display in the buttons.
trans-unit.target: Når du viser en kobling eller kommandoen knapp, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A>til å angi teksten skal vises i knappene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A> property, all buttons in a ButtonField share the same caption.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A>egenskapen, alle knapper i en ButtonField deler samme teksten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can bind the ButtonField object to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også binde ButtonField-objekt til et felt i en datakilde.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to display different captions for the buttons in the ButtonField object.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan du vise annen tekst for knappene i ButtonField-objektet.

trans-unit.source: The values that are in the specified field are used for the text captions of the buttons.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene i det angitte feltet brukes for tekst på knappene.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A> property to bind a ButtonField object to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A>til å binde et ButtonField-objekt til et felt i en datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: When displaying an image button, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.ImageUrl%2A> property to specify the image to display for the buttons in the ButtonField object.
trans-unit.target: Når du viser et bildeknappen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.ImageUrl%2A>til å angi bildet som skal vises for knappene i ButtonField-objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > All buttons in a ButtonField object share the same image.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alle knappene i et objekt for ButtonField deler samme bilde.

trans-unit.source: You can hide a ButtonField object in a data-bound control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan skjule et ButtonField objekt i en databundet-kontroll ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonField object allows you to customize its header and footer sections.
trans-unit.target: Objektet ButtonField kan du tilpasse inndelingene topp- og bunntekst.

trans-unit.source: To display a caption in the header or footer section, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: For å vise en tekst i topp-eller bunnteksten, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise et bilde i stedet for å vise tekst i toppteksten, ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide the header section in a ButtonField object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil skjule delen topptekst i et ButtonField-objekt, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some data-bound controls (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Noen databundet kontroller (slik som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen) kan vise eller skjule bare delen hele topp kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: These data-bound controls do not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A> property for an individual button field.
trans-unit.target: Disse databundet kontroller støtter ikke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen for et enkelt knapp.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the `ShowHeader` property for the control.
trans-unit.target: Vis eller Skjul delen hele overskrift for en databundet kontroll (hvis tilgjengelig), bruker du `ShowHeader` egenskap for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You also can customize the appearance of the ButtonField object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også tilpasse utseendet til ButtonField-objektet (skriftfarge bakgrunnsfarge og så videre) ved å angi stilegenskaper for de ulike delene av feltet.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene annen stil.

trans-unit.source: |Style property|The style settings for| |--------------------|----------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>|The child Web server controls of the ButtonField.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>|The footer section of the ButtonField.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>|The header section of the ButtonField.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>|The data items in the ButtonField.|
trans-unit.target: | Style-egenskapen | Stilinnstillingene for | |--------------------|----------------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>| De underordnede server webkontroller for ButtonField. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>| Bunntekstdelen i ButtonField. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>| Delen topptekst i ButtonField. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>| Dataelementer i ButtonField. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use the ButtonField constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk konstruktøren ButtonField til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren brukes vanligvis når du legger til felt til en dynamisk opprettet databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object dynamically to a data-bound control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>dynamisk objekt til en databundet kontroll, Opprett en ny <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objekt, angi egenskapene og deretter legge den til samlingen felt for kontrollen som er bundet til data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker for eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>styre, legge til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objekt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can add fields dynamically to a data-bound control, fields should be declared statically, and then shown or hidden, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om du kan legge til dynamisk til en databundet kontroll felt må være deklarert statisk, og deretter vises eller skjules, som kan brukes.

trans-unit.source: Statically declaring all of your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Statisk deklarerer alle feltene reduserer størrelsen på visningsstatusen for den overordnede databundet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that represents the action to perform when a button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref> object is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en streng som representerer handlingen som skal utføres når en knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref> objekt klikkes.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandName property to associate a command name, such as `"Add"` or `"Remove"`, with the buttons in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk kommandonavn-egenskapen for å knytte et kommandonavn eksempel `"Add"` eller `"Remove"`, med knappene den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: You can set the CommandName property to any string that identifies the action to perform when the command button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi kommandonavn-egenskapen til en streng som identifiserer handlingen som skal utføres når kommandoknappen.

trans-unit.source: You can then programmatically determine the command name in an event handler and perform the appropriate actions.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter programmatisk fastsette kommandonavnet i en hendelsesbehandling og utføre de nødvendige handlingene.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > All buttons in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object share the same command name.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alle knappene i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet deler samme kommandonavnet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls recognize certain command names and automatically raise and handle the appropriate events for the control.
trans-unit.target: Databundet Kontroller gjenkjenner enkelte kommandonavn automatisk heve og behandle nødvendige hendelser for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The following command names are recognized: - `"Cancel"` - `"Delete"` - `"Edit"` - `"Insert"` - `"New"` - `"Page"` - `"Select"` - `"Sort"` - `"Update"` To invoke paging, set the CommandName to `"Page"` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> of the contained <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control to `"First"`, `"Last"`, `"Prev"`, `"Next"`, or a page number.
trans-unit.target: Følgende kommandonavn gjenkjennes:- `"Cancel"` - `"Delete"` - `"Edit"` - `"Insert"` - `"New"` - `"Page"` - `"Select"` - `"Sort"` - `"Update"` for å aktivere Bla WantDestinationQueue kommandonavn `"Page"` og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>for den inkluderte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>styre til `"First"`, `"Last"`, `"Prev"`, `"Next"`, eller et tall.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, since the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> control is always the integer row index, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> control is not suitable for invoking paging.
trans-unit.target: Men siden den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>kontrollen er alltid radindeks heltall en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>kontrollen, kan ikke brukes til å starte Bla.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, while you can invoke sorting by setting the CommandName to `"Sort"`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> control is always the integer row index.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte da du kan aktivere sortering ved å angi kommandonavn `"Sort"`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>-egenskapen for et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>kontrollen er alltid rad heltallsindeks.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: For this reason, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> control is not suitable for invoking sorting.
trans-unit.target: Derfor en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>kontrollen, kan ikke brukes til å starte sortering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: For custom command names, such as `"Add"` and `"Remove"`, you need to write the event code to check the command name and perform some custom action.
trans-unit.target: For egendefinert kan du kommandoen navn, for eksempel `"Add"` og `"Remove"`, må du skrive hendelseskode for å kontrollere kommandonavnet og utføre en egendefinert handling.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCommands>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Not all command names are recognized by every data-bound controls.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Gjenkjennes ikke alle kommandonavn av hver databundet-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: For example, `"New"` is not recognized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and `"Select"` is not recognized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel `"New"` gjenkjennes ikke av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen og `"Select"` gjenkjennes ikke av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the action to perform when a button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på handlingen som skal utføres når en knapp i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref> klikkes.

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref> object to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Overfører egenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref> objektet til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.CopyProperties%2A> method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>-derived object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object that was created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.CopyProperties%2A>metoden er en hjelper som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å kopiere egenskapene for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase>-avledet objektet som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objektet som ble opprettet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.CopyProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> to which to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> du vil kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A> method of the base class to create an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object to which to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>-derived object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateField er helper metoden som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>-metoden til basisklassen til å opprette en tom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet som skal kopieres egenskapene for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>-avledet objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: En ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data field for which the value is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control that is rendered by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på verdien som er bundet til data-feltet i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text*>-egenskapen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"> </xref> kontrollen gjengis av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> value, use the DataTextField property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet er satt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>verdien, bruke egenskapen DataTextField til å angi navnet på feltet skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The values of the field are then displayed as the text for the buttons in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene i feltet deretter vises som tekst for knappene på i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can format the displayed text by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt formatere teksten som vises ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextFormatString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the DataTextField property to bind a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object to a field from a data source, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A> property to display static text for the text of the buttons in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å bruke egenskapen DataTextField ikke binde en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objekt til et felt fra en datakilde, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A>til å vise statisk tekst for teksten for knappene den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A> property is used, each button shares the same caption.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A>egenskapen brukes, hver knapp deler samme teksten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the DataTextField and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A> properties are both set, the DataTextField property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis DataTextField og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A>er begge egenskapene, prioriteres egenskapen DataTextField.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet skal bindes til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the DataTextField property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at DataTextField-egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir strengen som angir visningsformatet for verdien i feltet.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataTextFormatString property to specify a custom display format for the values that are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataTextFormatString-egenskapen til å angi et egendefinert visningsformat for verdiene som vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: If the DataTextFormatString property is not set, the value for the field is displayed without any special formatting.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen DataTextFormatString ikke er angitt, vises verdi for feltet uten formatering.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The format string is applied only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Formatstrengen som brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the value for the field.
trans-unit.target: Formatstrengen som kan være en strenglitteral og inkluderer vanligvis en plassholder for verdi for feltet.

trans-unit.source: For example, in the format string `"Item Value: {0}"`, the `{0}` placeholder is replaced with the value for the field when it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel i Formatstrengen `"Item Value: {0}"`, `{0}` plassholderen erstattes med en verdi for feltet når den vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: Resten av Formatstrengen vises som litteral tekst.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the format string does not include a placeholder, the value for the field from the data source is not included in the final display text.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis Formatstrengen som ikke inneholder en plassholder, verdi for feltet fra datakilden er ikke inkludert i den endelige teksten.

trans-unit.source: The placeholder consists of two parts, separated by a colon and wrapped in braces, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }.
trans-unit.target: Plassholderen består av to deler, atskilt med et kolon og omsluttet av parenteser, i formatet { `A` : `Bxx` }.

trans-unit.source: The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the index for the field value in a zero-based list of parameters.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for før kolon (`A` i eksemplet generelle) angir indeksen for feltverdien i en nullbasert liste over parametere.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This `A` parameter is part of the formatting syntax.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Dette `A` parameter er en del av syntaksen formatering.

trans-unit.source: Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: Fordi det er bare én feltverdien i hver celle, kan bare denne verdien settes til 0.

trans-unit.source: The colon and the values after the colon are optional.
trans-unit.target: Kolon og verdiene etter kolon er valgfrie.

trans-unit.source: The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet etter kolon (`B` i eksemplet generelle) angir formatet som du vil vise verdien.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common formats.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser vanlige formater.

trans-unit.source: |Format character|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > Except for `X`, the format characters are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: | Formater tegnet | Beskrivelse | |----------------------|-----------------| | `C`| Viser numeriske verdier i valutaformat. | | `D`| Viser numeriske verdier i desimalformat. | | `E`| Viser numeriske verdier i eksponentielt format (eksponentiell). | | `F`| Viser numeriske verdier i fast format. | | `G`| Viser numeriske verdier i formatet. | | `N`| Viser numeriske verdier i tallformat. | | `X`| Viser numeriske verdier i heksadesimalt format. | > [!NOTE] > Bortsett fra for `X`, format-tegn er bokstaver.

trans-unit.source: The `X` format character displays the hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified.
trans-unit.target: Den `X` formattegn viser heksadesimale tegn i tilfelle som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display.
trans-unit.target: Verdien etter tegnet format (`xx` i eksemplet generelle) angir antall signifikante sifre eller desimaler som vises.

trans-unit.source: For example, the format string `"{0:F2}"` displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel formatstrengen `"{0:F2}"` viser et faste punkt tall med to desimaler.

trans-unit.source: For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om formatering strenger, kan du se [formateringstyper](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: A format string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: Formatstrengen som angir visningsformatet for verdien i feltet.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at ingen spesielle formateringen til feltverdien.

trans-unit.source: Formats the specified field value for a cell in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Formaterer den angitte feltverdien for en celle i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The FormatDataTextValue method is a helper method that is used to transform a field value to the format that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Metoden FormatDataTextValue er helper metoden som brukes til å gjøre en verdi for feltet i formatet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextFormatString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The field value to format.
trans-unit.target: Feltverdien til å formatere.

trans-unit.source: The field value converted to the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextFormatString*> property.
trans-unit.target: Verdien i feltet konverteres til formatet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextFormatString*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image to display for each button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bildet som skal vises for hver knapp i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> value, use the ImageUrl property to specify the image to display for each button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet er satt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>verdien, bruke egenskapen ImageUrl til å angi bildet som skal vises for hver knapp.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format.
trans-unit.target: Dette bildet kan være i alle filformater (JPG, GIF, BMP osv), så lenge klientleseren støtter dette formatet.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The image to display for each button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bildet som skal vises for hver knapp i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the ImageUrl property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at egenskapen ImageUrl ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method is called by the data control with which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a rows collection.
trans-unit.target: I initialiseringsmetoden kalles av datakontrollen som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet som er knyttet til å utføre grunnleggende objektet initialisering for forekomster av feltet før feltet noensinne lagt til i en samling med rader.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: Data controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A> method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods, such as `CreateRow`, are called to create specific rows with data.
trans-unit.target: Data kontroller, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A>metoden i sine `CreateChildControls` metodene før andre metoder som `CreateRow`, kalles for å opprette bestemte rader med data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Call The Initialize method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects to perform basic initialization for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object.
trans-unit.target: Kall Initialize-metoden når du skriver en egendefinert kontroll for databindingselementer som bruker <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objekter til å utføre grunnleggende initialisering for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: Implement this method if your <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>-derived type requires any object initialization before it populates <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects with data or controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.InitializeCell%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementer denne metoden hvis din <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>-avledet type krever en objekt-initialisering før den fyller ut <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objekter med data, eller kontroller i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.InitializeCell%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.InitializeCell%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable sorting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å aktivere sortering; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The data control that owns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Datakontrollen som eier den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which indicates the control does not need to rebind to the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, noe som angir kontrollen trenger ikke å binde til dataene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> object to the specified row state.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer angitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> objektet til den angitte rad-tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeCell method creates the button type that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property and adds it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeCell oppretter Knappetype som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen og legger det til i <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is set to `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>kontrollen er satt til `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType"></xref> value that indicates the type of row (header, footer, or data).
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType"> </xref> verdi som angir typen for rad (topptekst, bunntekst eller data).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for raden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the static caption that is displayed for each button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir statiske teksten som vises for hver knapp i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> value, use the Text property to display static text for the caption of the buttons in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>eller - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>verdi, bruker du egenskapen tekst for å vise statisk tekst for teksten for knappene <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each button shares the same caption.
trans-unit.target: Hver knapp deler samme teksten.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the Text property to display static text in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A> property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å bruke Text-egenskapen til å vise statisk tekst i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objektet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A>til å binde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>til et felt i en datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: The values of the field are then displayed as the caption of the buttons.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene i feltet deretter vises som tittelen på knappene.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A> and Text properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A>og teksten er begge egenskapene, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A>egenskapen prioriteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The caption displayed for each button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises for hver knapp i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the controls that are contained in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"></xref> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om kontrollene som er i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField"> </xref> objekt støtte tilbakeringinger.

trans-unit.source: The ValidateSupportsCallback method is a helper method that is used to determine whether the controls that are contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ValidateSupportsCallback er helper metoden som brukes til å fastslå om kontrollene som finnes i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>objekt støtte tilbakeringinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden implementeres som en tom metode (en metode som ikke inneholder kode) til å angi at tilbakeringinger støttes.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ValidateSupportsCallback method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For ValidateSupportsCallback metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.
